thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: MORE THAN AN ALBERGO
thread.title_full: MORE THAN AN ALBERGO - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Malvernman
title: MORE THAN AN ALBERGO
text: Wasn't sure what to expect from an albergo, which sounds modest. But it is surely **** standard in a perfect location. We paid for a room on 6th floor overlooking the Pantheon. Wondered about noise at night in the centre of a capital city, but this was not a problem and we had the window open. It was the seagulls who woke us the next morning! Because of pedestrianisation there is no traffic, and any street entertainers stopped at a decent hour. We have stayed in more expensive hotels in Rome but for value for money loved this one.
